dataTemplate.name: XXQAFQAE
dataTemplate.description: OD OB Factory Quality Audit Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT od_fqa_id , od_pb_fqa_requester , od_pb_fqa_req_d , od_pb_proj_num , od_pb_division , od_sc_audit_agent , od_sc_region , od_pb_gso_office , od_sc_vendor_number , od_ob_vendor_name , od_ob_factory_number , od_sc_factory_name , od_sc_factory_address , od_pb_factory_contact , od_sc_factory_email , od_pb_fqa_assigned_date , od_pb_audit_date , od_pb_auditor_name , od_pb_audit_type , od_pb_attachment , od_ob_fqa_general , od_pb_design_control_score , od_pb_purchase_control_score , od_pb_storage_management_score , od_pb_incoming_inspect_score , od_pb_production_control_score , od_pb_continuous_improve_score , od_pb_fqa_score , od_ob_audit_grade , od_pb_cap_yn , od_fqa_cap_id , od_pb_qa_engr_email , od_pb_approval_status , od_pb_fqa_reaudit_type , od_pb_fqa_reaudit_d , od_pb_comments FROM q_od_ob_fqa_v WHERE NVL (od_pb_fqa_requester, 'X') = NVL (:p_requested_by, NVL (od_pb_fqa_requester, 'X')) AND NVL (od_pb_division, 'X') = NVL (:p_division, NVL (od_pb_division, 'X')) AND NVL (od_sc_audit_agent, 'X') = NVL (:p_agent, NVL (od_sc_audit_agent, 'X')) AND NVL (od_pb_gso_office, 'X') = NVL (:p_gso_office, NVL (od_pb_gso_office, 'X')) AND NVL (od_ob_vendor_name, 'X') = NVL (:p_vendor, NVL (od_ob_vendor_name, 'X')) AND NVL (od_sc_factory_name, 'X') = NVL (:p_factory, NVL (od_sc_factory_name, 'X')) AND NVL (od_pb_auditor_name, 'X') = NVL (:p_auditor, NVL (od_pb_auditor_name, 'X')) AND NVL (od_pb_cap_yn, 'X') = NVL (:p_cap, NVL (od_pb_cap_yn, 'X')) AND NVL (od_pb_audit_type, 'X') = NVL (:p_audit_type, NVL (od_pb_audit_type, 'X')) AND NVL (od_pb_qa_engr_email, 'X') = NVL (:p_approver, NVL (od_pb_qa_engr_email, 'X')) AND NVL (od_pb_approval_status, 'X') = NVL (:p_approval_status, NVL (od_pb_approval_status, 'X')) ORDER BY 1
